name: Dragon World Adventures
description:
Dragon World Adventures is a classic platform game that combines old school game play with modern playability. There was a dragon artifact which sealed the Hell Gate, but one day it was shattered into 5 pieces, hold by 5 villains. In order to save the world from being overwhelmed by demons. you need to follow the adventures of Calot, a Dragon Warrior, who will face multiple challenges to collect these pieces before it's too late!
***** Features *****
- A large number of handcrafted adventure levels
- 5 BIG bosses
- Over 10 different kinds of monsters
- Cool effects
- Beautiful and friendly user interface
- Easy gameplay and intuitive controls
- Coin collection to power up your character
- Rankings for you and your friends

*** Help Calot find 5 pieces of Dragon Artifact to stop invasion of darkness realm ***
